intro.content: Welcome to Lightsler AI Translator (the "Service"). By installing or using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully.

service.title: Service Description
service.content: Lightsler AI Translator provides AI-powered translation services for Shopify stores, including but not limited to:
features: Translation of products, collections, pages, blogs, themes, and other store content

billing.title: Billing and Payment
items: Subscription Plans: We offer multiple subscription tiers with monthly recurring charges through Shopify Billing.
Free Trial: New users may be eligible for a free trial period. After the trial, your selected plan will be charged automatically.
Credits System: Each plan includes a monthly credit allocation. Additional credits can be purchased as top-ups (non-expiring, one-time charge).
Payment Processing: All payments are processed securely through Shopify's billing system.
Refunds: Subscription fees are generally non-refundable. Unused credits expire at the end of each billing cycle (except top-up credits).
Price Changes: We reserve the right to modify pricing with 30 days' notice. Changes will not affect your current billing cycle.

data.title: Data and Privacy

Translation content is processed by our AI provider (OpenAI-compatible API) in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
We do not sell or share your data with third parties except as necessary to provide the Service.
